item.title: About Sakshyam
item.description: Skills Some skills that I have! Ability to program in C, python, and javascript (pronounced: havascript) Web building - You be the judge on that Vim - Surprise Surprise Git - init, add, commit, push, rebase, branch, checkout, merge, pull Linux Servers - If you don’t trust me when I say this, I don’t know who you will. Strategizing - Pretty good at planning things out, especially in a team Typing (90+ wpm) - perfecting my sword (keyboard) Solve a Rubik’s cube in under 20 seconds Boil Water What I use linux-kernel - I daily drive linux-kernel with mint distro.
